kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent: I still really enjoy attending user groups, especially when there's a chance to meet like-minded people and exchange real-world experiences. I also go to some of the bigger tech conferences organized by software vendors, and recently I've started attending quite a few AI conferences and gatherings as well. On a personal note, I find the CMS Experts meetups particularly interesting and inspiring. It's great to connect with others who share a passion for DXP.
